main event: A UFO sighting report dated December 6, 1954, at Olmsted AFB, Pennsylvania, indicates a probable balloon object.
interesting points: The object was observed for half a minute,The observer reported it was at an altitude between 6,000 to 8,000 feet,The object was seen with a course of 314 degrees,The observer was a 24-year-old Central Traffic Operator,This case includes film in a separate folder.
